title: Gross value added per hour worked
creator: https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/office-for-national-statistics
summary: Measure of business productivity (estimate of the volume of goods and services produced) in £ per hour worked (official statistics in development), UK, 2004 to 2023.
description:
This dataset shows the measure of business productivity (estimate of the volume of goods and services produced) in £ per hour worked (official statistics in development), in the UK, for 2004 to 2023.

### Coverage 

UK 

#### Geography definition

Local Authority Districts and Unitary Authorities,
Combined Authorities,
ITL1 (UK Nations, English Regions, UK less Extra-Regio)

### Source

 - UK: [Office for National Statistics](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/economicoutputandproductivity/productivitymeasures/bulletins/regionalandsubregionallabourproductivityuk/previousReleases)

measure.label: Gross value added per hour worked
